1.11.3.3.1:
fixes item duplication and removal if picked up with full inventory
pickup message now works correctly in singleplayer
1.11.3.3:
Added color editor
added item pickup widget
fixed hunger preview not working with offhand
fixed display bug for modern HUD's hunger preview
1.11.3.2:
Added compass element
fixed array crash on using modern HUD and getting poisoned
fixed hud load error bug
fixed arrow count bug
1.11.3.1.1: Fixed severe casting bug and color bug
1.11.3.1: Initial release of the mod remake
